hero.title: Where Artificial Intelligence Meets Comprehensive Security
hero.description: Mi9 is a pioneering technology company in developing dedicated AI solutions for businesses and comprehensive information security. We help businesses improve performance, optimize processes and ensure data safety — all in a reliable platform that does not share information with third parties.

features.title: Advanced Intelligence, Human-like Intuition
features.description: Built with modern technology to understand, learn and adapt to your specific needs.

autoLearning.title: Automatic Learning
autoLearning.description: Atlas learns from your interactions, continuously improving responses and actions to serve you better.

naturalInteraction.title: Natural Interaction
naturalInteraction.description: Communicate using natural language and gestures. Atlas understands context and responds appropriately.

preciseMovement.title: Precise Movement
preciseMovement.description: Advanced motor joints provide flexible, natural movement with superior balance and coordination capabilities.

humanoidSection.title: Built with the precision of Swedish engineering and the adaptability of human intuition
humanoidSection.description: Atlas represents the pinnacle of robotic innovation, combining cutting-edge technology with human-like intelligence and movement.

card1.title: Learning from every interaction to become more capable

card2.title: Handling complex tasks with precision and care

card3.title: Working alongside humans as a trusted

specs.title: By automating repetitive tasks, enhancing system security, and continuously learning from internal processes, Mi9 helps businesses optimize operations so people can focus on core values: creativity, decision-making, and innovation.

form.validationError: Please fill in all required fields

validation.required: Please fill in all required fields

showcase.title: Experience the Future Today
showcase.description: Our cutting-edge humanoid robot is designed to transform how we interact with technology in everyday environments.
showcase.imageAlt: Advanced humanoid robot with orange and white design
showcase.cardDescription: Built with precision engineering and sophisticated AI, our robots seamlessly integrate into various environments, from homes to hospitals, providing assistance and enriching human experiences.

manufacturing.content: Atlas transformed our production line, handling repetitive tasks while our team focuses on innovation. 30% increase in output within three months.
manufacturing.author: Sarah Chen

logistics.content: Implementing Atlas in our fulfillment centers reduced workplace injuries by 40% while improving order accuracy. The learning capabilities are remarkable.
logistics.author: Michael Rodriguez

research.content: Atlas adapted to our lab protocols faster than any system we've used. It's like having another researcher who never gets tired and maintains perfect precision.
research.author: Dr. Amara Patel

business.content: As a mid-size business, we never thought advanced robotics would be accessible to us. Atlas changed that equation entirely with its versatility and ease of deployment.
business.author: Jason Lee

newsletter.title: Subscribe to the newsletter
newsletter.description: Be first to hear about breakthroughs, partnerships, and deployment opportunities

success.title: Thank you for subscribing!
success.description: You'll receive updates about Atlas soon.
